title: 2000 Wins - Rioters requested!
body: Riot, I've got 2000 normal wins. Would any of you fine employees want to join me for a game? ^_^

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=ZyiriGx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=9KdB3Ra4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-10T01:02:38.275+0000)
>
> Is this actually a thing?!?! :O

Yes, it happens all the time. For most milestones Riot employees would take time out to play with you... But sometimes they either don't get around to it or don't see when someone asks, so it's not guaranteed.
Gotta keep the post fresh so they see it!
